sentences.english: The life can have how many stroke?
Why is it necessary to sigh-off gentleman.
sentences.chinese: 人生能有幾回搏，君子何須嘆離合。

sentences.english: Fight a year in spring and summer, autumn and winter, cardiac life no regrets.
sentences.chinese: 拼一年春夏秋冬，搏一生無怨無悔。

sentences.english: And I don't think the win over Bolton will change any of that.
sentences.chinese: 我不覺得我們勝了搏爾頓後事情會有所轉變。

sentences.english: Energy efficiency (EE) is the ratio of SW to TE.
sentences.chinese: 心室的能量效率爲搏出功與總能量之比。

sentences.english: Getting a good job often requires a bit of gamesmanship.
sentences.chinese: 要得到份好工作往往需要“搏一把”。
